title: Establishment of a Presidential Task Force to avoid the use of poisonous and dangerous drugs
decision_details: - The Joint proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Defence; the Minister of Justice, Prison Affairs and Constitutional Reforms; and the Minister of Public Security to establish a Presidential Task Force to identify, plan and implement the suitable pragmetic measures to combat dissemination and use of the poisonous and dangerous drugs and avoid their use, was approved by the Cabinet.
